website_summaries.verdict: An affordable model with modern appeal and a price tag that won't put too much stress on your budget.
pros: This wall-mount model's price may surprise you, considering its high-end looks
Has stainless steel filter that can be cleaned in the dishwasher
Emits nice lighting that makes it easy to see your range surface while cooking
cons: Somewhat slow to remove fumes and odors, but eventually gets the job done
High setting is on the loud side

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install if your handy
customer_reviews.text: I spent quite a bit of time reviewing kitchen exhaust hoods.. I decide d on this one based on the comments an reviews. 4 speeds first 2 are very quite 3rd still powerful and fairly quite too.4th and most powerful noise level no louder then our microwave.. Easy to install if your handy,no different than any other hood. Everything was perfect from shipping to unit itself..extremely satisfied. Would recommend this product to anyone
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The lights go on and off intermittently even when not using. So I contacted the seller. He wanted me to put in a new "motherboard". I was not comfortable with this at all. Especially because it is electrical and didn't want to risk my home catching fire. They weren't willing to take a return and send me another. So I am going to have to purchase a new one from somewhere else. Also it is very loud and like others have said it looks good but it is mediocre at best. Multiple presses to get stuff to work. Halogen lights which make it very hot and expensive to replace. I hope I've learned my lesson.
customer_reviews.author: BAM123

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect for the space I have and the install was ...
customer_reviews.text: "Absolutely Beautiful" - I searched for weeks to find a hood vent with a wider chimney stack and finally found this one. It's perfect for the space I have and the install was fairly simple - but I must admit, the first one I received didn't work so I contacted the seller by phone. To my surprise they were very helpful as well as apologetic and promptly replaced it in just a matter of days. The wife and I are very pleased'
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Williams

customer_reviews.title: Directions weren't very good but ours very well priced and looks and functions ...
customer_reviews.text: Directions weren't very good but ours very well priced and looks and functions great but if you're not very handy you might need help installing it
customer_reviews.author: Kameron

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Used for an outdoor patio over the grill With the proper cover over exhaust, no water gets in. I like the seamless edges on the hood . Good value for the money
customer_reviews.author: IOSIF M.

customer_reviews.title: and the controls are not bad.
customer_reviews.text: Doe the job, but the instructions aren't quite right. Also, I had a few loose screws I needed to tighten before I could install it. Bottom line though, it's a bunch of sheet metal with a fan blower. That seems solid, and the controls are not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and installed very easy. Had a broken part and they fixed it very quickly!!
customer_reviews.author: JT Livingston

customer_reviews.title: the hood looks nice but touch pad functions leave a lot to be ...
customer_reviews.text: you get what you pay for. the hood looks nice but touch pad functions leave a lot to be desired. the instructions are very general and not specific to any model. touch pad is flimsy and difficult to master. would not recomend
customer_reviews.author: Luna 1

customer_reviews.title: Very sleek looking
customer_reviews.text: Just installed it yesterday! Love it ! Looks very sleek! Not too loud! Light is nice and bright! Looks perfect with black stainless appliances!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid. Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great hood for home use. Powerful enough for anything. Quiet enough to not be annoying. Looks great. Cleaning the vents is easy. Can't beat for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan & Audrey Thompson

customer_reviews.title: It dents so easily 2. The LED display is not well glued ...
customer_reviews.text: 1. It dents so easily 2. The LED display is not well glued to the hood so it keeps falling down 3. The LED display does not light up completely.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Tello Jr.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It's haunted. Turns fan on and off on its own
customer_reviews.author: ken  kellogg

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. FYI the light is not super bright
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. FYI the light is not super bright, but in the middle of the night, or if all.the kitchen lights are not blazing, looks very cool.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this its very modern and works great have had it for a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: It works wonderfully. The noise when turning on/off light and functions ...
customer_reviews.text: My handyman added a few screws to hold it tight against the wall which greatly reduced the vibration noise. It works wonderfully. The noise when turning on/off light and functions is very loud and annoying, though.
customer_reviews.author: Marian LF

customer_reviews.title: This product doesn't even draw air! There is no ...
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't even draw air! There is no ventilation what so ever!!! I had it installed two weeks ago and I have had two fires and my new paint job need painting!
customer_reviews.author: pamela Shea

customer_reviews.title: Suction could be a little better for all the noise that it makes
customer_reviews.text: Loud. Suction could be a little better for all the noise that it makes.
customer_reviews.author: StPeteDad

customer_reviews.title: The fan is very quiet and I love the sleek look for my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: The fan is very quiet and I love the sleek look for my kitchen. The undercount light is perfect. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Once install works great!
customer_reviews.text: Install instructions are not writted very well, we managed though. Instructions are the same from multiple model numbers and not very clear. Once install works great!
customer_reviews.author: Renee C.

customer_reviews.title: We bought this last year, in March, for ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this last year, in March, for a house that we were remodeling. We moved into the house in August and the vent hood has already died!!! We had our electrician check it out and he said the "mother board" needed to be replaced. We called the company...no answer but left a voice mail....no return phone call!!! URGH!! If I could give a zero rating, I would!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Baker

customer_reviews.title: There is no way to adjust the time, if ...
customer_reviews.text: There is no way to adjust the time, if I had known this I would have ordered a different model or brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service when we had a vaulted ceiling issue. Wonderful product as well!
customer_reviews.author: Beth and Brian Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: It does not work period. I had a professional ...
customer_reviews.text: It does not work period. I had a professional installed the hood for me, the first day I start the fan and I see all the fumes going pass the vent so I opened the covers and the fan was just making noise, it was not actually doing its job. I paid 299 for this hood and on top of it I had to pay another 150 to get it it install. Value out of 450 dollars is 0. All this is a noise making machine.
customer_reviews.author: Shyam

customer_reviews.title: very poor suction - our fire alarm keeps going off making ...
customer_reviews.text: I had this product professionally installed, very poor suction - our fire alarm keeps going off making me wonder if it is actually sucking anything. When I'm cooking, I can watch the fumes bypass the unit. There is some suction but it just isn't very strong at all. Also worth noting the LED clock is super bright with no way to dim it, so I guess it will function as a night light as well.
customer_reviews.author: Crash

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful. We do a lot of cooking and use spices.
customer_reviews.author: Linda McDonough

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. I was worried about only having two front lights, but they are very bright and light up the whole cook surface..In short, I really like it and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great vent hood with great suction and bright lights
customer_reviews.text: Great vent hood with great suction and bright lights. I will be replacing the bulbs with LEDs in the near future as the Halogen light get very hot. We vented this hood to the outside and did not use the carbon filters. Only down fall is we had to order this vent hood twice as the first one had a dent and scratch on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

product_meta.title: FireBird European Style Wall Mount Stainless Steel Range Hood Vent with Touch Control and Carbon Filters (36)
product_meta.description:
Size:36

Note: This item is not available for SHIPPING TO AK, HI, and PR. OR APO.FPO.DPO.

This bold range hood design is bound to catch your eyes with its smooth brushed stainless steel to its robust edges. The Firebird wall mount range hood comes in a 36-inch width and has a lot to offer for the chef in your household. Turn on your touch panel and see the multiple options like a sixty-minute timer, twelve-hour clock, and a three-speed fan that can reach up to 343 CFM. Three Stainless Steel Baffle filters keep unwanted oil particles from leaving odors and keeping your kitchen fresh. They can be easily cleaned through your dishwasher and can easily be put back with no hassle. For ductless recirculating installation, a carbon filter kit is included (CF0011).

 * Dimension: 35.25 in. W x 19.75 in. L x 42.25 in. H
 * Minimum Drop Down Height: 26.5 in.
 * Required Ceiling Height: 8 to 8.5 ft.
 * Airflow: 343 CFM
 * Level of Speed: 3
 * Control Type: Touch Panel
 * Noise Level: Less than 65db at 343 CFM
 * Lighting: 2 x LED
 * Product Finish: Brushed Stainless Steel
 * Voltage: 120-Volt / 60Hz
 * Filter Type: 3 x Stainless Steel Baffle Filter
 * Ductless / Ventless: Convertible with included carbon filters (CF0011)
 * Vent Location: Top
 * Additional Chimney: Yes (Sold Separately)
 * Certification: ETL Compliance with US and Canada Safety Standards
 * Warranty: Limited 3 Years Parts Warranty

Note: This item is not available for SHIPPING TO AK, HI, and PR. OR APO.FPO.DPO.
feature_bullets: WHAT YOU NEED: On the search for the ultimate range hood for a professional-looking kitchen? We have the answer: the Firebird 36” stainless steel wall mount hood vents will eliminate any steam or odor!

PREMIUM POWER: The pyramid-shape wall mount hood has a powerful 194W motor that will suck any steam or smoke from cooking. The range hood has 3 speed levels through which you can choose the intensity of the air suction.
TOP MATERIALS: The kitchen range hood is made with stainless steel which guarantees for the premium quality of the product, as well as a modern and minimalist design suitable for any kitchen style.

EFFICIENT FILTER: The professional range hood has baffle filters that are dishwasher safe so you can remove any grease or smoke stains, ensuring a perfect airflow and efficient ventilation of the entire kitchen.
QUIET & PRACTICAL: Although powerful, the 1.5A motor of the kitchen exhaust fan is extremely quiet, keeping the noise level under 65db. Also, LED lamps ensures the light you need for cooking.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars47 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
